""ANNAM PARABRAHMASWAROOPAM" says our Indian philosophy. This means that food is equal to God as told by our great ancient Sayers. But we, their descendant, are we giving the same amount of respect to this age-old God? Frankly, most of us do not. 

 Result : 
Millions of our fellow beings are dying in hunger when millions of tons of food is being thrown away, wasted, discarded, whatever; for no good reason most of the times. Other times there are a few good complications because of which food is wasted. Except for them, this is a very simple problem with possibilities of simple solutions. In brief it is "Don't waste food; Give it to others."
"

This app is developed to save the food. In these days so much food is wasted in hotels, restaurants, functions etc. This leftover food can be effectively utilized by donating it to needy people so food wastage can be prevented. Donating food will help a lot of people who are suffering to get one mean per day. Leftover Food Donation app provides very simple method to contact the food donors. App is helpful to those who wants to donate food or can take initiative of supplying food to the needy people by taking from donors. \n Please save food, donate food and make it to reach the people in need of it. Lets join our hands together in making our country hunger free.

1) Register to the app through register form
 2) Login to the app to use the app features
 3) Donate food : You can donate food by filling a form which includes the food details like food name, quantity, description, contact information of donor and food image. This food is visible to all the other users.
 4)Find food : Food is to be found out using donor names. App will display all the donors and their corresponding foods. Those who want to take it can directly contact donor using his contact number and later manual operation needs to be done for food transfer.
 5) User can delete his account which intern deletes details for his food donations from the database.
 6) User can logout to from his account using logout button present on dashboard.
